name: GRUSH
description:
A  miner goes down to an abandoned mine to collect all sorts of precious stone, he brought his trusty slingshot to defend himself from the creatures that infest the cave.

Controls :
  • Movement - WASD
  • Fire/Shoot - Left Mouse Button
  • Inventory - E (nothing implemented for it sadly)

The goal of the game is to collect as many stone by pushing them into the many stone extractor that is located in the map while trying to survive the never ending swarm of enemies

- Stone Extractor

Credits:

Character designs and the animations are made by team member Jefry Tan. 

Tilemaps are from  finalbossblue's  (Ashland Tileset)

Game Music is from  Joshua McLean's (FREE Music Pack 5: Chiptune 2) (Mountain Trials)
